items.title: Exploring Universality and Pluralities of Values
items.description: Using the free energy principle as a guide, we explore the relationship between universal truth, goodness, and beauty transcending time and culture, and the pluralities of values.

items.title: Society and History Through Information and Thermodynamics
items.description: Reinterpreting Hannah Arendt's 'worldness' through information theory and Kojin Karatani's 'modes of exchange' through thermodynamics to elucidate social structures and historical dynamics.

items.title: Practicing Value Co-creation Beyond Conflict
items.description: Overcoming inevitable value conflicts through pragmatism focused on minimizing transaction costs and digital democracy, aiming for practical harmony.
